oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discharge certificate and Enlistment Record of John D. Dickson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Honorable Discharge and enlistment record for Sgt. John D. Dickson who, enlisted Aug. 15, 1917 at Chicago, Illinois. Enlistment record Includes certification that bronze Victory Medal has been issued. Dickson was working as a ranger in Montana but came home to Chicago to enlist. He served in Co. B, 54th Inf., then transferred to the Medical Co.
